mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alphafrog_portfolio (user_id, name, visibility, tags, status, timezone, ext) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{visibility}, CAST(#{tagsJson} AS jsonb), #{status}, #{timezone}, CAST(#{extJson} AS jsonb))
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, visibility, tags::text AS tags_json, status, timezone, ext::text AS ext_json, created_at, updated_at FROM alphafrog_portfolio WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId} AND status != 'archived' LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE alphafrog_portfolio SET name = #{name}, visibility = #{visibility}, tags = CAST(#{tagsJson} AS jsonb), status = #{status}, timezone = #{timezone}, ext = CAST(#{extJson} AS jsonb), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
